Jennifer Helsby
My interests are data analysis methods, machine learning, privacy and security.
I'm currently a postdoctoral scholar at the Center for Data Science and Public Policy
at the Computation Institute and the Harris School for Public Policy at the University of Chicago.
Previously I was a 2015 Data Science for Social Good Fellow and an astrophysicist
at the Kavli Institute for Cosmological Physics.
Drop me a line at jen@redshiftzero.com or on twitter @redshiftzero.


Projects:
Predictive modeling to estimate risk of building code issues in Cincinnati
Academic publications in astrophysics
Organizing digital security trainings in Chicago

Blog posts:

    Manipulation and Machine Learning
